bioAsHtml: Hi there! I’m Samantha, and I play with language for a living. You see, I own Flip Script Media, a UX copywriting and content strategy agency, and Undertone.io, a language design studio that specializes in conversational and voice user interface design. In other words, voice and tone are my thing. My linguistic background, paired with my passion for tech and AI, empowers me to help brands communicate with consistency, clarity, coherence, and above all, compassion. ❤️
